semantic_title: Mechanical Ventilator Weaning Encounters - Coding Sequence for Chronic Respiratory Failure with Ventilator Dependence
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 21. Factors Influencing Health Status > c. Categories of Z Codes > 3) Status

content.full_text: For encounters for weaning from a mechanical ventilator, assign a code from subcategory J96.1, Chronic respiratory failure, followed by code Z99.11, Dependence on respirator [ventilator] status. (Evidence: pg no: 94, L21-L22)
content.summary: Specific coding sequence required for mechanical ventilator weaning encounters using chronic respiratory failure code followed by ventilator dependence status code (Evidence: pg no: 94, L21-L22)
key_concepts: Mechanical ventilator weaning encounters (Evidence: pg no: 94, L21)
Chronic respiratory failure coding (Evidence: pg no: 94, L22)
Ventilator dependence status (Evidence: pg no: 94, L22)
Required code sequencing (Evidence: pg no: 94, L21-L22)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Assign code from subcategory J96.1 first, followed by code Z99.11 (Evidence: pg no: 94, L21-L22)
detailed_rules.explanation: For ventilator weaning encounters, the chronic respiratory failure code must be sequenced before the ventilator dependence status code (Evidence: pg no: 94, L21-L22)
common_applications: Chronic respiratory failure with ventilator dependence

workflow_steps: Step 1: Identify encounter as ventilator weaning
Step 2: Assign appropriate code from subcategory J96.1
Step 3: Assign code Z99.11 as secondary code

code_ranges.description: Chronic respiratory failure subcategory (Evidence: pg no: 94, L22)
code_ranges.requirement: Must be sequenced first for ventilator weaning encounters
usage_rules: Use for ventilator weaning encounters (Evidence: pg no: 94, L21-L22)

specific_codes.context: Secondary code for ventilator weaning encounters

incorrect_coding.rationale: Missing the required chronic respiratory failure code
incorrect_coding.common_mistake: Using only the status code without the underlying condition

best_practices: Always use both codes in specified sequence for ventilator weaning (Evidence: pg no: 94, L21-L22)
